phrase.text: There is no food in the stronghold!

You can establish a supply route from the neighbouring village to supply the stronghold with food.\n\nSelect the village by left-clicking in the centre and right-click on the stronghold's townhall. This can be done from both the normal view or the minimap.

You can do the same thing by pressing the "Supply" command that you'll find in all of the outposts and villages. Left-click the command and left-click again on the desired destination.\n\nYou can activate and deactivate the viewing of supply routes on the map by pressing 'ALT'.
